thread.title: Joshua
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Joshua

author: Joshua
title: Joshua
text: I am not going to lie- I was a little skeptical at first but learning how Select Auto and Home compares more than 10 companies for the lowest price made me a little curios to see what will happen if I call. My experience with my rep, William was fantastic. William was very knowledgably and took the time and energy to explain everything thoroughly to me. This call could've been over quickly after I signed up, but William made sure that he answered all of my questions and mentioned suggestions. As soon as I got off this call, I made sure to refer him to other family members.
